flavorText: Puppeteered by Heidar's icy hand, they were sacrificed to the Frost Marsh to raise Haakon's army.

foreignData.flavorText: Von Heidars eisiger Hand gelenkt wurden die Märtyrer den Frostmarschen geopfert, um Haakons Armee zu erschaffen.

foreignData.text: {1}, zeige X schwarze Karten aus deiner Hand offen vor, opfere die Märtyrerin der Knochen: Entferne bis zu X Karten deiner Wahl aus genau einem Friedhof ganz aus dem Spiel.

foreignData.flavorText: Manejados por la mano helada de Heidar, fueron sacrificados al Cenagal escarchado para alzar el ejército de Haakon.

foreignData.text: {1}，从你手上展示X张黑色牌，牺牲白骨殉道者：将X张目标在同一坟墓场中的牌移出对战。

name: Martyr of Bones
originalText: {1}, Reveal X black cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Bones: Remove up to X target cards in a single graveyard from the game.

rulings.text: Each card that’s revealed to pay the cost remains revealed until the ability leaves the stack.
A card that’s already revealed for another cost or because of an effect can be revealed to pay this cost.
If one of the cards that’s revealed to pay the cost leaves its owner’s hand before the ability resolves, it stops being revealed, but the value of X is not affected.

text: {1}, Reveal X black cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Bones: Exile up to X target cards from a single graveyard.
